data.title: Used Furniture Cantilever Rack
data.meta-description: Used Furniture Cantilever Rack for Sale at American Surplus, In Stock and ships nationwide, call our sales team to design your furniture cantilever rack and save 40-60% compared to new.

ul.li: Includes decking to create solid level
Perfect for any type of furniture storage application
Not limited to furniture, store other large bulk items

long-description.p: Used furniture cantilever rack is perfect for storing any type of furniture items and other large bulky items. Such as: chairs, couches, desks, cabinets, matresses, beds and more. Plywood and wire decking is installed across the cantilever arms to create a solid level. Used furniture cantilever rack allows for storage without front obstructions. The benefits include being able to store a variety of loads with different lengths anywhere along the entire level.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used cantilever rack 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
